sourcesContent:
// Here we put queries. Remove next line
import { gql, useQuery } from '@apollo/client';

export const GET_COLLECTIONS = gql`
    query ProductList {
        products{
            id,
            createdAt,
            updatedAt,
            languageCode,
            name,
            slug,
            description,
            featuredAsset,
            assets,
            variants,
            variantList,
            optionGroups,
            facetValues,
            translations,
            collections,
            customFields
            }
    }
`;
